author: namapane
body: This PR is a backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/45243 to 14_0_9_patchX, as suggested in that PR's [discussion](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/45243#issuecomment-2200136767).
title: [14_0_9_patchX] Add a protection for pathologic cases in MuonBeamspotConstraintValueMapProducer
